# Compare WebGL and SVG in R

### WebGL

```{r}
library(plotly)
p <- ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat, y = price, color = cut)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.01)
ggplotly(p) %>% toWebGL()
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
plotly_POST(filename="compare/webgl")
```

### SVG 

> The draw time for this plot will be slow for all clients.

```{r}
library(plotly)
library(plotly)
p <- ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat, y = price, color = cut)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.01)
ggplotly(p)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
plotly_POST(filename="compare/svg")
```
